name: 601 - Black Label - Limited Edition 2021 Toro
additionalNotes: The 601 Black was one of the first full-bodied Connecticut wrapped cigars released in the early 2000’s. It is handmade in Esteli, Nicaragua, by Erik Espinosa and originally blended by Don Pepin Garcia, Erik Espinosa and Eddie Ortega. The 601 brand is now completely under the control of Erik Espinosa allowing for more focus on the brand and blend. After almost a decade, the 601 Black Label has returned, and it's sure to be as popular as the original was.
